name: Non-Stick Frying Pan
description: High-quality non-stick frying pan with ergonomic handle. Perfect for eggs, pancakes, and stir-fries. 10-inch diameter.

name: Stainless Steel Knife Set
description: Professional 8-piece knife set with wooden block. Includes chef's knife, paring knife, bread knife, and more.

name: Glass Storage Containers
description: Set of 5 airtight glass containers with bamboo lids. Perfect for meal prep and food storage. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Silicone Spatula Set
description: Heat-resistant silicone spatula set in 4 colors. Non-stick, flexible, and easy to clean. Set of 3.

name: Cast Iron Dutch Oven
description: 5-quart cast iron Dutch oven with enamel coating. Perfect for slow cooking, baking, and stovetop use.

name: Ceramic Knife Sharpener
description: Dual-stage ceramic knife sharpener. Easy to use, no oil required. Suitable for all types of knives.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board
description: Large bamboo cutting board, 18x12 inches. Eco-friendly, lightweight, and easy to clean.

name: Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls
description: Set of 3 stainless steel mixing bowls with non-slip bottoms. Nestable for easy storage.

name: Plastic Food Containers
description: Set of 12 plastic food containers with lids. Various sizes for different storage needs. BPA-free.

name: Wooden Spoon Set
description: Set of 4 wooden spoons in different sizes. Natural wood, heat-resistant, and eco-friendly.

name: Measuring Cup Set
description: Set of 6 stainless steel measuring cups. Includes 1/4, 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 3/4, and 1 cup sizes.

name: Insulated Water Bottle
description: Stainless steel insulated water bottle, 32oz. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.
